cmCourseInfo.description: Introduction to grammar and basic vocabulary of Swahili. Emphasis on comprehension and oral practice. Reading of selected texts. Relation of the language to its East African cultural context.
cmCourseInfo.title: Introductory Swahili

notes.name: Course Note
notes.content:
Delivery Instructions

Lectures are delivered online. Learning is self-paced and not reliant on a course meeting time. Students need an internet connection and access to the course website (Quercus) and the ability to use online tools made available by the university, such as Office 365 and Zoom. Students may require access to a webcam, headset and microphone.
